metadata.title: CVE-2018-12040 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** Reflected Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in theweb profiler in SensioLabs Symfony 3.3.6 allows remote attackers to injectarbitrary web script or HTML via the "file" parameter, aka an_profiler/open?file= URI.  NOTE: The vendor states "The XSS ... is in theweb profiler, a tool that should never be deployed in production (so, wedon't handle those issues as security issues)."

criterions.comment: symfony: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
